ThingDef.label: extradextrous arm
ThingDef.description: By strengthening the muscles in the entire arm, as well as increasing fine nervous control, the entire performance of the arm is increased.

ThingDef.label: ossified bone saber
ThingDef.description: By creating sharp bone growths that naturally keep themselves unnaturally sharp, we can create an appendage more lethal than any sword.

ThingDef.label: voracious maggot bolter
ThingDef.description: By creating a rapidly growing strain of maggots and adapting them to life in our bodies, we can use them as bullet-like ammunition in our bio-weapons.
